{% raw %}
<div class="z-help"><h1>MongoDB 软件仓库</h1>
<p>MongoDB 镜像自 MongoDB <a href="https://repo.mongodb.org/">官方仓库</a>，目前有 RHEL/CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian 的镜像，支持 amd64, i386, arm64 架构。</p>
<p>更详细的内容，可以参考 <a href="https://docs.mongodb.org/master/administration/install-on-linux/">官方文档</a></p>
<h3>Debian/Ubuntu 用户</h3>
<p>首先选择要安装的版本</p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form z-global" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"><div><label for="4UpSamvu" title>MongoDB 版本号</label><select id="4UpSamvu" name="version" title><option value="6.0">6.0</option><option value="5.0">5.0</option><option value="4.4">4.4</option><option value="4.2">4.2</option></select></div></form></div>
<p>信任 MongoDB 的 GPG 公钥：</p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-lang="bash">
wget -qO - https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-{{version}}.asc | {{sudo}}apt-key add -
</tmpl>
<p>再选择你的 Debian / Ubuntu 版本，文本框中内容写进 <code>/etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb.list</code></p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"><div><label for="zD3DvJ4l" title>发行版</label><select id="zD3DvJ4l" name="release" title><option value="bullseye">Debian 11 (bullseye)</option><option value="buster">Debian 10 (buster)</option><option value="stretch">Debian 9 (stretch) (EOL)</option><option value="jessie">Debian 8 (jessie) (EOL)</option><option value="jammy">Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy)</option><option value="focal">Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal)</option><option value="bionic">Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic)</option><option value="xenial">Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) (EOL)</option></select></div></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-input="release" z-path="/etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb.list">
deb {{endpoint}}/apt/{{os}} {{release}}/mongodb-org/{{version}} {{repo}}
</tmpl>
<p>安装 <code>mongodb-org</code> 即可</p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-lang="bash">
{{sudo}}apt-get update
{{sudo}}apt-get install -y mongodb-org
</tmpl>
<h3>RHEL/CentOS 用户</h3>
<p>新建 <code>/etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb.repo</code>，内容为</p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-lang="ini" z-path="/etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb.repo">
[mongodb-org]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl={{endpoint}}/yum/el$releasever/
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1
</tmpl>
<p>刷新缓存并安装 <code>mongodb-org</code> 即可。</p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-lang="bash">
{{sudo}}yum makecache
{{sudo}}yum install mongodb-org
</tmpl><script id="z-config" type="application/x-mirrorz-help"></script>
</div>

{% endraw %}
